description: Don't use this - use the ones starting with word. Creates a powershell script that will create a macro word doc when run.

customAttributes.name: macro
customAttributes.description: The macro to add to the document. No default.

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the powershell file to be created, can be full path or just a name

runHint: If wordDocOut is relative it it'll end up in the current users documents folder.
